channel.title: medium on A+ Accessibility and Inclusive Design Audit
channel.description: Recent content in medium on A+ Accessibility and Inclusive Design Audit

item.title: Link Purpose
item.description: Requirements Sometimes, assistive technology users will look at a list of links or headings from a web page. VoiceOver allows users to do this from the “rotor” while browsing the web. 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) (level A): 2.4.9 Link Purpose (Link Only) (level AAA): By ensuring the text is descriptive and unique, we enable users to quickly find what they are looking for.
